We Support You on your Path to Success

We help Spanish community build rewarding, high-paying careers in the beauty industry of Colorado for 15 years

  • Our prices are 30% lower than competitors

    We aim to make education З community, which is why we keep our prices at a minimum

  • We provide bilingual education

    We want to make Spanish speakers feel as comfortable as possible. For that our owner recently secured the opportunity to take final exams in Spanish in Colorado

  • 70% of our education is practice

    First on professional mannequines and then on people

  • We accept pupils with SSN and Item Driver License
